abstract: the message tommy wiseau wanted to share at golden globes .
article: social media exploded when james franco stopped wiseau from grabbing the mic during his acceptance speech ; some saying it was wise because ` the room ' actor is sometimes peculiar , others upset the man who ` the disaster artist ' is about did n't get to say something . tommy wiseau just wanted to share a message of love before he was stopped from going to the microphone on sunday night when james franco won a golden globe for his performance in the disaster artist . franco , who won best actor in a motion picture musical or comedy , plays wiseau in the film about the making of the room , a cult favorite considered to be the best-worst film ever made .

wiseau , known for being a character , tried to get to the mic when he was invited up on stage by franco during his acceptance speech , but he was stopped cold in his tracks by franco . social media exploded at the moment ; some saying it was wise because wiseau is sometimes peculiar , others upset the man who the film is about did n't get to say something . it seems we now know what he was going to say . not long after the moment , wiseau tweeted from his verified twitter account , `` if a lot of people love each other the world will be a better place to live !

`` he later confirmed to the l. a. times that is what he was planning to say on stage . if a lot of people love each other the world will be a better place to live ! -- tommy wiseau january 8 , 2018 .
